Description

I'm Pepe Coronil, also known as Pepe Coral, a passionate video game designer and programmer.I'm working on a new project called Target Party, which promises to be a fast-paced and exciting first person platformer. I am constantly learning and improving my skills. I look forward to continuing to grow as a videogame developer as I'm dedicated to creating innovative and captivating games that players will love.

History

When I was a Child

I've been passionate about video games since I was a kid. I started making my own games at the age of 12 using GameMaker, and quickly fell in love with the creative process of game development. At that time I was really bad but I started to learn the basis of coding

Highschool

When GameMaker turned into a pay-to-use tool I moved to Unity and learnt how to use C# and how to use Unity itself, soon I found a really powerful tool that let me use my imagination to create games

Since Then Every Summer

In addition to my regular game development learning, I also love to participate in online game jams. Every summer, I take part in a number of these events to challenge myself and push my skills to the limit. I didn't wanted to stop there and I went to MalagaJam an incredible game jam hosted in Malaga, there I made a game with a team. That was my first time making games with a team.

Currently

I'm currently studying software engineering at university, where I'm learning the latest skills and technologies to excel in my field. Meanwhile I am developing my first comercial project called Target Party
